author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: Think we have 2 to 6 more weeks of up only for crypto. Depends on how fast we will overheat. Then we might see the cycle top: Rate Cuts/Catalysts priced in, Stock Meltup coming to an end, perfect timing cycle wise (halving/top to top count), trapping the herd (expects q4 top).
